name: Demon Of The Dark
description:
SURVIVE


Progress through the horrifying hospital, try not to fall prey for the monster who is somewhere in the darkness. Solve puzzles to get a step closer to the exit and making your way out of this nightmare. Your journey will only get more and more twisted, and troubled, as you move on.


THE MONSTER


The monster goes on a killing spree once it escapes its enclosure, and wreaks havoc, killing countless people. Escaping it is near impossible, due to it's stealth and quick movement. If you see him, RUN. The only option is to run for your dear life, before the monster reaches you and ends your life.

PRODUCT DESCRIPTION


Prepare to be terrified and immersed in a chilling world with Demon of the Dark. Step into the shoes of a police investigator who stumbles upon a crash near an abandoned hospital, only to uncover the horrifying secrets of an evil corporation. This gripping game will keep you on the edge of your seat as you navigate through dark hallways and solve twisted puzzles. Are you ready to face your fears? Play Demon of the Dark and prepare for a bone-chilling experience like no other.

STORY


The story covers the story of Ethan, who has been assigned the duty to investigate and figure out the horrifying secrets of an abandoned hospital, while looking out for the multiple dangers in his path. His sanity will be tested as he progresses, and needs to find a way out. A failed experiment will come in his way and try to end his life, as Ethan will desperately find a way to escape. The results of this incident will leave Ethan traumatized for the rest of his life
